page.title: 05THORNHILL WHIRRIESTON FARM
page.content: My dad's farm has 215 acres in all.It is all arable land above the Carse. We grow about145 acres of barley and 7 acres of wheat and 30 acres of grass. The rest is peas,potatoes and turnips. We have about 110 beef cattle. They are mostly all Herefords with some Friesian heifers. We bought in 15 Charolais, Aberdeen Angus and Limousin.We have a Hereford bull but we are going to sell it. My dad also rents another 60 acres from neighbuoring farms. We have a combine,2 tractors and a digger. We also have 19 other pieces of modern farm equipement. We get our machinery from the local firm of Dykes or Hamilton of Larkhall.
